trans-unit.source: The SearchResultCollection class contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> instances that the Active Directory hierarchy returned during a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> query.
trans-unit.target: La classe SearchResultCollection contiene il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> istanze di gerarchia di Active Directory restituita durante una <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"> </xref> query.

trans-unit.source: Due to implementation restrictions, the SearchResultCollection class cannot release all of its unmanaged resources when it is garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: A causa di limitazioni di implementazione della classe SearchResultCollection non può rilasciare tutte le risorse non gestite quando è sottoposto a garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: To prevent a memory leak, you must call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method when the SearchResultCollection object is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare una perdita di memoria, è necessario chiamare il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>metodo quando l'oggetto SearchResultCollection non è più necessario.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines if a specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object is in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> oggetto è incluso nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object to find.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> oggetto da trovare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified property belongs to this collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la proprietà specificata appartiene alla raccolta. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects in this collection to the specific array, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia tutti <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> oggetti della raccolta nella matrice specificata, a partire dall'indice specificato nella matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects that receives the elements of this collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> gli oggetti che riceve gli elementi della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `results` where this method starts copying this collection.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero `results` in cui questo metodo avvia la copia di questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> oggetti della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> oggetti della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate da di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method, it allows the resources that are used by the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose, consente le risorse utilizzate da di <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>riallocazione per altri scopi.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Dispose, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su Dispose, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not release memory for a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Il garbage collector non rilascia la memoria per un <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, an application must call the Dispose method explicitly to prevent a memory leak.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, un'applicazione deve chiamare il metodo Dispose in modo esplicito per evitare una perdita di memoria.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite utilizzate da di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection"> </xref> oggetto ed eventualmente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>metodo e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>richiama il metodo Dispose protetto con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes Dispose with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama Dispose con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro `true`, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>riferimenti.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not release memory for a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Il garbage collector non rilascia la memoria per un <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method explicitly to prevent a memory leak.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, è necessario chiamare il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>metodo in modo esplicito per evitare una perdita di memoria.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A> method of each object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>metodo di ciascun oggetto nella raccolta.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [si esegue l'override del metodo Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that you can use to iterate through this collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un enumeratore che consente di scorrere la raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that you can use to iterate through this collection.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>oggetto che è possibile utilizzare per scorrere la raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle that is returned by the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) method that performs the actual search.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'handle restituito dal [IDirectorySearch:: ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) metodo che esegue la ricerca effettiva.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il [IDirectorySearch:: ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) argomento in MSDN Library all'indirizzo [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> that created this collection calls the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) method, which makes the query results available to the T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>che ha creato questo insieme chiama il [IDirectorySearch:: ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) metodo, che rende disponibili per l'oggetto t: System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection i risultati della query.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il [IDirectorySearch:: ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) argomento in MSDN Library all'indirizzo [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: Each time that a query is performed, a handle for the results of that query is associated with its <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Ogni volta che viene eseguita una query, a cui è associato a un handle per i risultati della query relativa <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: This handle corresponds to the search handle in ADSI.
trans-unit.target: Questo handle corrispondente all'handle di ricerca in ADSI.

trans-unit.source: This handle persists until you call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> method on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> object, so you must call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> to prevent a memory leak.
trans-unit.target: L'handle viene mantenuto finché non si chiama il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>metodo il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>dell'oggetto, è necessario chiamare <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>per evitare una perdita di memoria.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector does not free memory for this particular object.
trans-unit.target: Il garbage collector non libera la memoria per questo particolare oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE value that this collection uses.
trans-unit.target: Il valore ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE usato da questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'indice della prima occorrenza dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> oggetto nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object to search for in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> oggetto da cercare nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first matching object.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero del primo oggetto corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: Returns -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce -1 se non sono presenti membri della raccolta identici al <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object that is located at a specified index in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> oggetto che si trova in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: In c#, questa proprietà è l'indicizzatore per la <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>classe.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>

trans-unit.source: In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own.
trans-unit.target: In JScript è possibile utilizzare le proprietà predefinite indicizzate definite da un tipo, ma non è possibile definire in modo esplicito la propria.

trans-unit.source: However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property whose type is Object and with an index type of <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, specificando l'attributo expando in una classe fornisce automaticamente un valore predefinito proprietà indicizzata il cui tipo è Object e con un tipo di indice di <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> oggetto da recuperare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> object that is located at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> oggetto che si trova in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> properties that were specified before the search was executed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"> </xref> le proprietà specificate prima dell'esecuzione della ricerca.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.String> that contains the properties that were specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad*> property collection before the search was executed.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref:System.String>che contiene le proprietà che sono state specificate nel <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad*>raccolta di proprietà prima dell'esecuzione della ricerca.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> to an <xref:System.Array>, starting at a particular <xref:System.Array> index.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi del <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>per un <xref:System.Array>a partire da un particolare <xref:System.Array>indice.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>che costituisce la destinazione degli elementi copiati da <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Array>deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero `array` da cui avviare la copia.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayè multidimensionale.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - il numero di elementi nell'origine è maggiore dello spazio disponibile da index alla fine della destinazione array.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di origine non può essere eseguire automaticamente il cast al tipo della destinazione array .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'accesso per il <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>è sincronizzato (thread-safe).</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>Restituisce un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection></xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Classi di raccolte la maggior parte di <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>spazio dei nomi anche implementare un metodo sincronizzato, che fornisce un wrapper di sincronizzazione per la raccolta sottostante.</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'enumerazione di una raccolta non è quindi una procedura thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Anche se una raccolta è sincronizzata, altri thread possa comunque modificare la raccolta, che determina l'enumeratore generare un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la protezione dei thread durante l'enumerazione, bloccare la raccolta per l'intera enumerazione oppure intercettare le eccezioni determinate dalle modifiche apportate da altri thread.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic, c#] Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come bloccare la raccolta utilizzando la <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>durante l'intera enumerazione: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ``` </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'accesso al <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>è sincronizzato (thread-safe); in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto che può essere usato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Per raccolte il cui archivio sottostante non è disponibile pubblicamente, l'implementazione prevista è di restituire l'istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's `SyncRoot` property.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il puntatore all'istanza corrente potrebbe non essere sufficiente per le raccolte che incapsulano altre raccolte; questi ultimi dovranno restituire la raccolta sottostante `SyncRoot` proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Classi di raccolte la maggior parte del <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>dello spazio dei nomi anche implementare un `Synchronized` metodo, che fornisce un wrapper di sincronizzazione per la raccolta sottostante.</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, le classi derivate possono fornire una propria versione sincronizzata della raccolta mediante la <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> of the collection, not directly on the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il codice di sincronizzazione è necessario eseguire operazioni sul <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>della raccolta, non direttamente sulla raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo si garantisce il corretto funzionamento delle raccolte derivate da altri oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, mantenuta la sincronizzazione con altri thread che potrebbero modificare contemporaneamente l'istanza della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: In the absence of a `Synchronized` method on a collection, the expected usage for <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> looks like this: ```c# ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` [Visual Basic] ``` Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: In assenza di un `Synchronized` metodo in una raccolta, l'utilizzo previsto per <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>simile al seguente: ```c# ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` [Visual Basic] ``` Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` enumerazione di una raccolta non è quindi una procedura thread-safe.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Anche se una raccolta è sincronizzata, altri thread possa comunque modificare la raccolta, che determina l'enumeratore generare un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la protezione dei thread durante l'enumerazione, bloccare la raccolta per l'intera enumerazione oppure intercettare le eccezioni determinate dalle modifiche apportate da altri thread.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic, c#] Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come bloccare la raccolta utilizzando la <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>durante l'intera enumerazione: ```c# ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb# Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ``` </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
